explains: n. 发牢骚；肠胃绞痛；紧握；小艇扣带
v. 发牢骚；肠胃绞痛；握紧；惹恼；用扣带系紧（小艇）；偏航

sentences.en: My only gripe about the hotel was the food.
sentences.cn: 我对这家旅馆唯一不满的是伙食。

sentences.en: My only gripe is that one main course and one dessert were unavailable.
sentences.cn: 我惟一的不满是还差一道主食和一份甜点。

sentences.en: The host generally pays, and no one wants to hear you gripe about appetizer prices or shrimp count.
sentences.cn: 主人通常都会支付账单，没人想要听到你抱怨关于开胃菜的价格或者小虾的个数。
